name: cross_account_peering
description: Handle cross_account peering setup and teardown

scripts.test: env-cmd -f .env.test mocha --inspect=0.0.0.0:8080 --watch --extensions ts --watch-files src-ts,tests -r ts-node/register 'tests/**/*.ts' --watch --exclude tests/interactive.ts
scripts.build: npm run compile && cp package.json dist/src && cd dist/src && npm install --production
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist/src && zip -r ../code.zip ./

author: Severin Gassauer-Fleissner sev@amazon.com
